au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: SAWt10_offset
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(9154,300) # Drive guide to g4 config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for ga) driveEntRotAp(330) #set sample ap to 12.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -23) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(257)
